Package hac.services

Class PlayerService

java.lang.Object
hac.services.PlayerService
@Service public class PlayerService extends Object
The member service acts like an api to the players DB.

      public Player createNewPlayer(String username)
      The method creates a new player at the DB.
      Parameters:
      username - the new user's username

    • getPlayerByUsername

      public Player getPlayerByUsername(String username, Boolean needToLockDB) throws RuntimeException
      The function returns the player object by its username.
      Parameters:
      username - The searched username.
      needToLockDB - If the DB is needed.
      Returns:
      The found user.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - Thrown in case the search has failed.

    • getRoomByUsername

      public Room getRoomByUsername(String username, Boolean toLockDB) throws RuntimeException
      The function gets the room the received player in.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      toLockDB - If the DB lock action is needed.
      Returns:
      The room the player at.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - when there is an error to find the room.

    • getRoomStatusByUserName

      public Room.RoomEnum getRoomStatusByUserName(String username)
      The method returns the status of the room which the player at.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      Returns:
      The status of the room which the player at.

    • getPlayerStatusByUsername

      public Player.PlayerStatus getPlayerStatusByUsername(String username)
      The function returns the player's status. Assumption - the function who called this function locked the needed locks.
      Parameters:
      username - The player's username.
      Returns:
      The player's status.

    • setWinnersInModelReturnIfNotFound

      public Boolean setWinnersInModelReturnIfNotFound(String username, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      The function sets the received user as winner in the received model and returns if the user not found.
      Parameters:
      username - The winner user.
      model - The reset model.
      Returns:
      If the user been found in the DB.
